config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The upScalingAlgorithm configuration option is loaded from the preference store and used to set the upscaling algorithm for image processing.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The upScalingAlgorithm configuration is triggered whenever the loadPrefs() method is called, which typically happens when the application starts or when the user changes settings.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The choice of upScalingAlgorithm can impact the quality and performance of image upscaling in the system. Choosing a more advanced algorithm may result in better quality but slower processing, while choosing a simpler algorithm may sacrifice quality for speed.
